compounddef.title: Arithmetic constraints
compounddef.innergroup: Value selection for assigning float variables

briefdescription.para: With smallest degree divided by domain size.
With largest degree divided by domain size.
With smallest accumulated failure count divided by domain size.
With largest accumulated failure count divided by domain size.
With smallest activity divided by domain size.
With largest activity divided by domain size.
Select values not greater than mean of smallest and largest value.
Select values greater than mean of smallest and largest value.
Select values randomly which are not greater or not smaller than mean of largest and smallest value.
Select value according to user-defined functions.
Select median value of the lower part.
Select median value of the upper part.
Select median value of a randomly chosen part.
Select value according to user-defined functions.

briefdescription.para: Function type for explaining branching alternatives for set variables.
Whether to try the lower or upper half first.

memberdef.argsstring: (Home home, FloatVar x0, FloatVar x1, FloatVar x2)
memberdef.name: min

briefdescription.para: Post propagator for $ \min x=y$ If x is empty, an exception of type Float::TooFewArguments is thrown.

briefdescription.para: Post propagator for $ \max x=y$ If x is empty, an exception of type Float::TooFewArguments is thrown.

detaileddescription.para: The only member functions that can be used on a constructed but not yet initialized AFC storage is init or the assignment operator.

briefdescription.para: Initialize for float variables x with decay factor d.
Initialize for float variables x with decay factor d.

detaileddescription.para: This member function can only be used once and only if the AFC storage has been constructed with the default constructor.
The only member functions that can be used on a constructed but not yet initialized activity storage is init or the assignment operator.

memberdef.argsstring: (Home home, const FloatVarArgs &x, double d=1.0, FloatBranchMerit bm=NULL)
memberdef.name: FloatActivity

briefdescription.para: Initialize for float variables x with decay factor d.

detaileddescription.para: If the branch merit function bm is different from NULL, the activity for each variable is initialized with the merit returned by bm.

memberdef.argsstring: (Home, const FloatVarArgs &x, double d=1.0, FloatBranchMerit bm=NULL)
memberdef.name: init

briefdescription.para: Initialize for float variables x with decay factor d.

detaileddescription.para: If the branch merit function bm is different from NULL, the activity for each variable is initialized with the merit returned by bm.
This member function can only be used once and only if the activity storage has been constructed with the default constructor.

briefdescription.para: Initialize with random number generator r.
Initialize with selection strategy s and tie-break limit function t.
Initialize with selection strategy s, decay factor d, and tie-break limit function t.
Initialize with selection strategy s, AFC a, and tie-break limit function t.
Initialize with selection strategy s, activity a, and tie-break limit function t.
Initialize with selection strategy s, branch merit function mf, and tie-break limit function t.
Expand decay factor into AFC or activity.
Initialize with random number generator r.
Initialize with value function f and commit function c.
Initialize with random number generator r.
Initialize with value function f and commit function c.
